resume_text:
NAME: David Garcia
EMAIL: david.g@email.com
PHONE: (555) 789-0123

SUMMARY:
Senior DevOps Engineer with extensive experience in automating infrastructure and deployments. Proven ability to improve system reliability and efficiency.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Git, Jenkins

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Ltd. - DevOps Engineer (2015 - Present)
- Automated the deployment process, reducing deployment time by 50%.
- Improved system monitoring and alerting, leading to a 20% reduction in incidents.
Software Company - System Administrator (2013 - 2015)
- Managed and maintained Linux servers.

EDUCATION:
Tech Institute - Bachelor's in Information Technology (2013)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
